long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Instant YouTube allows you to see the view number of any youtube video and choose it to watch instantly on google.com, bing.com, duckduckgo.com, and other search engines without entering youtube.com. 

This extension will record the latest videos you have watched, you can find them and play them by clicking the corresponding history in the chrome context menus at any website.

You can use all the youtube shortcuts to watch videos.

This extension is open sourced: https://github.com/ExxEss/Instant-YouTube
